metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9988 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
ARM mbed TLS before 2.1.11, before 2.7.2, and before 2.8.0 has a buffer over-read in ssl_parse_server_key_exchange() that could cause a crash on invalid input.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-9988` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto7 - 2.8.0-1
libmbedtls14 - 2.8.0-1
libmbedx509-1 - 2.8.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.0-1').
